body.raw:
{ "name"                             : "SecureDomain2"
, "identityProvider"                 : "FederationIdentityStore"
, "description"                      : "OAuth Domain"
, "tokenSettings"                    : [
    { "tokenType"                    : "ACCESS_TOKEN"
    , "tokenExpiry"                  : 3600
    , "lifeCycleEnabled"             : false
    , "refreshTokenEnabled"          : true
    , "refreshTokenExpiry"           : 86400
    , "refreshTokenLifeCycleEnabled" : false
    }
  , { "tokenType"                    : "AUTHZ_CODE"
    , "tokenExpiry"                  : 3600
    , "lifeCycleEnabled"             : false
    , "refreshTokenEnabled"          : true
    , "refreshTokenExpiry"           : 86400
    , "refreshTokenLifeCycleEnabled" : false
    }
  , { "tokenType"                    : "SSO_LINK_TOKEN"
    , "tokenExpiry"                  : 86400
    , "lifeCycleEnabled"             : false
    , "refreshTokenEnabled"          : true
    , "refreshTokenExpiry"           : 86400
    , "refreshTokenLifeCycleEnabled" : false
    }
  ]
, "customAttrs"                      : "{\"usePKCE\":\"ALL_CLIENTS_TYPES\"}"
, "errorPageURL"                     : "http://vwase051.bka.extrapol.de:7807/oam/pages/error.jsp"
, "consentPageURL"                   : "http://vwase051.bka.extrapol.de:7807/oam/pages/consent.jsp"
}

{ "idDomain"                : "SecureDomain2"
, "id"                      : "igsservice"
, "name"                    : "igsservice"
, "secret"                  : "Welcome1"
, "clientType"              : "CONFIDENTIAL_CLIENT"
, "description"             : "The client application making resource requests on behalf of the resource owner with the resource owners authorization."
, "attributes"              : [
    { "attrName"            : "sessionId"
    , "attrValue"           : "$session.id"
    , "attrType"            :  "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "preferred_username"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.uid"
    , "attrType"            :  "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "groups"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.groups"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "upn"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.policeIdentifierName"
    , "attrType"           : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "preferred_username"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.uid"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "full_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.cn"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "family_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.sn"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "given_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.givenName"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "email"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.mail"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  ]
, "idTokenCustomClaims"     : []
, "accessTokenCustomClaims" : []
, "userInfoCustomClaims"    : []
, "redirectURIs"            : []
, "grantTypes"              : [
    "PASSWORD"
  , "CLIENT_CREDENTIALS"
  , "JWT_BEARER"
  , "REFRESH_TOKEN"
  , "AUTHORIZATION_CODE"
  , "TOKEN_EXCHANGE"
  ]
, "scopes"                  : [
    "igsresource.all"
  ]
, "defaultScope"            : "igsresource.all"
}

urlencoded.description: Grant Type for the Access Token Request

request.description:
The Password grant is used when the application exchanges the users username and password for an access token.

This is exactly the thing OAuth was created to prevent in the first place, so you should never allow third-party apps to use this grant.

urlencoded.description: Grant Type for the Access Token Request

request.description:
This is typically used by clients to access resources about themselves rather than to access a user's resources.

This is typically used by clients to access resources about themselves rather than to access a user's resources.
